title: iPadOS 16: Here’s what we know so far about new features, supported devices, and more
content:
WWDC 2022 will start a couple of weeks from now. On June 6, Apple will announce iPadOS 16, which will mark the next major release of Apple’s software platform for the iPad. Head below as we recap all of the latest rumors and expectations for iOS 16 this year, including new features, release info, and more.

more…

The post iPadOS 16: Here’s what we know so far about new features, supported devices, and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: iPadOS 16 is set to be announced in just a few weeks. Here's what we know so far about new features in the iPadOS, supported devices, more.
